body: ive seen a few members on something called 'build'. is this just for staff or...?
body_tagged: ive seen a few members on something called 'build'. is this just for staff or...?
title: build ?

replies.body: Its probably a build server. Map Developers might be able to provide you with more info
replies.body_tagged: Its probably a build server. Map Developers might be able to provide you with more info

replies.body: Build is a staff only build server.
replies.body_tagged: Build is a staff only build server.

replies.body: I love the text when it says "making dirt houses on build" haha! yep, Nolan said it. It's a build server for staff:)
